name: Reginar-B
flavor_text: You stand at the head of the army.

frame.name: Häkke Precision Frame
frame.description: This weapon fires a small auto-tracking missile. Missiles lock onto targets when aimed.

perks.description:
This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Increases projectile speed
perks.name: Quick Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's explosives are more effective.
  •  Slightly increases blast radius
  •  Decreases stability
perks.name: Black Powder

perks.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
perks.name: Field Prep
